New Records: Hayden Birdsong lasted only 3 2/3 innings in his start against the Brewers, marking the fifth time in the past six games that a Giants starter hasnâ€™t made it out of the fifth inning.
Key Match Events: The Brewers scored one of their runs on a double steal in the third inning, with William Contreras scoring on the play after Matt Chapman mishandled the throw.
Pre-Game Insights: The Giants' pitching struggles continued with Hayden Birdsong and other starters failing to complete five innings in recent games.
Post-Match Reflections: San Francisco Giants third baseman Matt Chapman expressed confidence that the team can still make a run for the playoffs despite their current standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Civale, the Brewers' starter, pitched seven scoreless innings, allowing only two hits.
